title: Shark Bait (Grab Your Pole, #1) - Jenn Cooksey.epub
description:
Previously homeschooled Camie Ramsey is being shoved into the shark-infested waters of public high school, where even helium filled, penguin bespeckled arm floaties likely wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t help keep her inexperienced, fifteen-year old head above water in that rip current of hormones and emotions.

CamieÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s worldly wisdom might be severely lacking (i.e., the closest sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s come to being kissed was sitting too close to the TV whilst Jake Ryan leaned in to give Samantha that fateful 16th birthday kiss), but she does understand her only hope for survival is if sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s thrown some kind of Ã¢â‚¬Å“socialÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ life preserver before she sinks like a freaking rock. However, what will her fate be when she endeavors to flag down the only lifeguard on duty, the enormously popular and ridiculously beautiful Tristan Daniels? The most sought after and virtually most unattainable guy in school who not only makes CamieÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s heart flatline on a recurring basis, heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s also the one guy who seemingly doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t know she exists.

Feeling like an inept piece of chum that could ultimately be swallowed by Jaws, can Camie get Tristan to rescue her from floundering in the treacherous deep, or is she destined to be Shark Bait?
